name: Game of Stonks
description:
An early prototype in development. You can print out some NFTs. Place them around. Share a link to show off your room. And do a bat quest. 

Controls: 

W,A,S,D  to move

F to Sit, Pin object in place.

Q to equip weapon

Left mouse button grabs some objects like printed items. Just try to bump them into the wall to turn it the right way. 

You need an 0X address or Wax address to load some NFTs. Enjin currently disabled.

You can print out some 3D objects but have no control over their size yet.

You don't have to play by using your shortlink. saving is disabled while visiting a room (multiplayer elements might be coming in the future.) Progress is saved locally in the browser.

In Development: Print out living  objects, NPCs / Mverse objects. More quests. In game currency. Trading NFTs. Play2Earn mechanics. Getting the NPCs to work in browser mode so the city can be alive.,,

Note~ Anything earned in the game is just play money. It requires no special wallet signatures and nothing will be changed on the blockchains (yet).
